00029 #define THROW_SITE_INFO(what)                                           \
00030   std::string(std::string(what) + "\n" +                                \
00031               "  in " + std::string(BOOST_CURRENT_FUNCTION) + "\n" +    \
00032               "  at " + std::string(__FILE__) + ":" +                   \
00033               BOOST_STRINGIZE(__LINE__) + "\n")
00034 
00035 #define ASSERT_THROW_PA(_x) {                                           \
00036     const PaError __pa_error_code__((_x));                              \
00037     if (__pa_error_code__ < paNoError)  {                               \
00038       throw std::runtime_error(THROW_SITE_INFO("assertion failed: "     \
00039                                                + std::string(#_x) + " '" \
00040                                                + std::string(Pa_GetErrorText(__pa_error_code__))+"'")); \
00041     } else void(0); }
00042 
00043 namespace portaudio {
00044   class session_impl : public session {
00045   public:
00046     session_impl() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_Initialize()); }
00047     ~session_impl() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_Terminate()); }
00048 
00049     virtual int version_number() const { return Pa_GetVersion(); }
00050     virtual std::string version_text() const { return Pa_GetVersionText(); }
00051     virtual device_list get_device_list(std::string name) const {
00052       device_list result;
00053       const PaDeviceIndex numDevices(Pa_GetDeviceCount());
00054       for(int i=0; i<numDevices; i++) {
00055         portaudio::device_info::sptr dp(portaudio::device_info::make(Pa_GetDeviceInfo(i), i));
00056         if (name == "" || name == dp->name())
00057           result.push_back(dp);
00058       }
00059       return result;
00060     }
00061     virtual bool is_format_supported(stream_parameters::sptr input_parameters,
00062                                      stream_parameters::sptr output_parameters,
00063                                      double sample_rate) const {
00064       PaError err(paNoError);
00065       ASSERT_THROW_PA(err=Pa_IsFormatSupported((input_parameters  == 0) ? 0 : input_parameters->get(),
00066                                                (output_parameters == 0) ? 0 : output_parameters->get(),
00067                                                sample_rate));
00068       return (err == paNoError);
00069     }
00070     virtual void sleep(double seconds) const {
00071       Pa_Sleep((long int)(0.5+1000*seconds));
00072     }
00073   } ;
00074 
00075   session::sptr session::make() {
00076     return session::sptr(new session_impl());
00077   }
00078 
00079   session::sptr session::get_global_session() {
00080     static boost::weak_ptr<session> global_session;
00081     if (not global_session.expired()) return global_session.lock();
00082     const sptr new_global_session(new session_impl());
00083     global_session = new_global_session;
00084     return new_global_session;
00085   }

00087   class device_info_impl : public device_info {
00088   public:
00089     device_info_impl(const PaDeviceInfo* device_info,
00090                      PaDeviceIndex index) 
00091       : _device_info(device_info)
00092       , _index(index) {}
00093 
00094     std::string to_string() const {
00095       std::ostringstream oss;
00096       oss << "name= '" << name()  << "'"
00097           << " api_host_index= " << api_host_index()
00098           << " max_input_channels= " << max_input_channels()
00099           << " max_output_channels= " << max_output_channels()
00100           << " default_low_input_latency= " << default_low_input_latency()
00101           << " default_low_output_latency= " << default_low_output_latency()
00102           << " default_high_input_latency= " << default_high_input_latency()
00103           << " default_high_output_latency= " << default_high_output_latency()
00104           << " default_sample_rate= " << default_sample_rate() 
00105           << " index= " << _index;
00106       return oss.str();
00107     }

00110     virtual PaHostApiIndex api_host_index() const { return _device_info->hostApi; }
00111     virtual int max_input_channels() const { return _device_info->maxInputChannels; }
00112     virtual int max_output_channels() const { return _device_info->maxOutputChannels; }
00113     virtual PaTime default_low_input_latency() const { return _device_info->defaultLowInputLatency; }
00114     virtual PaTime default_low_output_latency() const { return _device_info->defaultLowOutputLatency; }
00115     virtual PaTime default_high_input_latency() const { return _device_info->defaultHighInputLatency; }
00116     virtual PaTime default_high_output_latency() const { return _device_info->defaultHighOutputLatency; }
00117     virtual double default_sample_rate() const { return _device_info->defaultSampleRate; }
00118 
00119     virtual PaDeviceIndex index() const { return _index; }
00120   private:

00177   class callback_info_impl : public callback_info {
00178   public:
00179     callback_info_impl(const PaStreamCallbackTimeInfo* p,
00180                        PaStreamCallbackFlags flags)
00181       : _current_time(p->currentTime)
00182       , _input_buffer_adc_time(p->inputBufferAdcTime)
00183       , _ouput_buffer_dac_time(p->outputBufferDacTime)
00184       , _flags(flags) {}
00185     
00186     virtual PaTime input_buffer_adc_time() const { return _input_buffer_adc_time; }
00187     virtual PaTime current_time() const { return _current_time; }
00188     virtual PaTime ouput_buffer_dac_time() const { return _ouput_buffer_dac_time; }
00189     virtual bool input_underflow() const { return _flags & paInputUnderflow; }
00190     virtual bool input_overflow() const { return _flags & paInputOverflow; }
00191     virtual bool output_underflow() const { return _flags & paOutputUnderflow; }
00192     virtual bool output_overflow() const { return _flags & paOutputOverflow; }
00193     virtual bool priming_output() const { return _flags & paPrimingOutput; }
00194 
00195     virtual std::string to_string() const {
00196       std::ostringstream oss;
00197       oss << (boost::format("%.3f") % current_time()) << " " 
00198           << (boost::format("%.3f") % input_buffer_adc_time()) << " "
00199           << (boost::format("%.3f") % ouput_buffer_dac_time()) << " "
00200           << (input_underflow() ? " input_underflow " : "")
00201           << (input_overflow() ? " input_overflow " : "")
00202           << (output_underflow() ? " output_underflow " : "")
00203           << (output_overflow() ? " output_overflow " : "")
00204           << (priming_output() ? " priming_output " : "");        
00205       return oss.str();
00206     }
00207   private:
00208     const PaTime _current_time;
00209     const PaTime _input_buffer_adc_time;
00210     const PaTime _ouput_buffer_dac_time;
00211     const PaStreamCallbackFlags _flags;
00212   } ;

00214   class stream_callback_impl : public stream_callback {
00215   public:
00216     stream_callback_impl(stream_parameters::sptr input_parameters,
00217                          stream_parameters::sptr output_parameters,
00218                          double sample_rate,
00219                          unsigned long frames_per_buffer,
00220                          PaStreamFlags stream_flags,
00221                          process_base::sptr p) 
00222       : _session(session::get_global_session()),
00223         _processor(p) {
00224       ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_OpenStream(&_pa_stream,
00225                                     (input_parameters  == 0) ? 0 : input_parameters->get(),
00226                                     (output_parameters == 0) ? 0 : output_parameters->get(),
00227                                     sample_rate,
00228                                     frames_per_buffer, // paFramesPerBufferUnspecified
00229                                     stream_flags,
00230                                     stream_callback_impl::callback,
00231                                     this));
00232     }
00233 
00234     ~stream_callback_impl() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_CloseStream(_pa_stream)); }
00235 
00236     virtual PaStream* get() { return _pa_stream; }
00237     virtual stream_info::sptr get_info() const {
00238       return stream_info::sptr(new stream_info_impl(Pa_GetStreamInfo(_pa_stream)));
00239     }
00240 
00241     virtual void abort() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_AbortStream(_pa_stream)); }
00242     virtual void start() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_StartStream(_pa_stream)); }
00243     virtual void stop()  { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_StopStream(_pa_stream)); }
00244 
00245     signed long get_write_available() const {
00246       signed long n(0);
00247       ASSERT_THROW_PA(n=Pa_GetStreamWriteAvailable(_pa_stream));
00248       return n;
00249     }
00250     virtual bool is_stopped() const {
00251       PaError err;
00252       ASSERT_THROW_PA(err=Pa_IsStreamStopped(_pa_stream));
00253       return (err == 1) ? true : false;
00254     }
00255     virtual bool is_active() const {
00256       PaError err;
00257       ASSERT_THROW_PA(err=Pa_IsStreamActive(_pa_stream));
00258       return (err == 1) ? true : false;
00259     }
00260     virtual PaTime get_time() const {
00261       const PaTime t(Pa_GetStreamTime(_pa_stream));
00262       if (t == 0) throw std::runtime_error(THROW_SITE_INFO("Pa_GetStreamTime returned zero"));
00263       return t;
00264     }
00265     virtual double get_cpu_load() const { 
00266       return Pa_GetStreamCpuLoad(_pa_stream); 
00267     }
00268     virtual process_base::sptr get_processor() {
00269       return _processor;
00270     }
00271   private:
00272     static int callback(const void *input_buffer, void *output_buffer,
00273                         unsigned long frames_per_buffer,
00274                         const PaStreamCallbackTimeInfo* time_info,
00275                         PaStreamCallbackFlags status_flags,
00276                         void *userData) {
00277       stream_callback_impl* sp(reinterpret_cast<stream_callback_impl*>(userData));
00278       const callback_info::sptr callback_info(new callback_info_impl(time_info, status_flags));
00279       return sp->get_processor()->process(input_buffer, output_buffer, frames_per_buffer, callback_info);
00280     }
00281 
00282     PaStream*          _pa_stream;
00283     session::sptr      _session;
00284     process_base::sptr _processor;
00285   } ;

00287   class stream_blocking_impl : public stream_blocking {
00288   public:
00289     stream_blocking_impl(stream_parameters::sptr input_parameters,
00290                          stream_parameters::sptr output_parameters,
00291                          double sample_rate,
00292                          unsigned long frames_per_buffer,
00293                          PaStreamFlags stream_flags) 
00294       : _session(session::get_global_session()) {
00295       ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_OpenStream(&_pa_stream,
00296                                     (input_parameters  == 0) ? 0 : input_parameters->get(),
00297                                     (output_parameters == 0) ? 0 : output_parameters->get(),
00298                                     sample_rate,
00299                                     frames_per_buffer, // paFramesPerBufferUnspecified
00300                                     stream_flags, 
00301                                     0,0));
00302     }
00303 
00304     ~stream_blocking_impl() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_CloseStream(_pa_stream)); }
00305 
00306     virtual PaStream* get() { return _pa_stream; }
00307     virtual stream_info::sptr get_info() const {
00308       return stream_info::sptr(new stream_info_impl(Pa_GetStreamInfo(_pa_stream)));
00309     }
00310 
00311     virtual void abort() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_AbortStream(_pa_stream)); }
00312     virtual void start() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_StartStream(_pa_stream)); }
00313     virtual void stop() { ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_StopStream(_pa_stream)); }
00314 
00315     virtual bool is_stopped() const {
00316       PaError err;
00317       ASSERT_THROW_PA(err=Pa_IsStreamStopped(_pa_stream));
00318       return (err == 1) ? true : false;
00319     }
00320     virtual bool is_active() const {
00321       PaError err;
00322       ASSERT_THROW_PA(err=Pa_IsStreamActive(_pa_stream));
00323       return (err == 1) ? true : false;
00324     }
00325     virtual void read_data(void* buffer, unsigned long frames) {
00326       if (Pa_ReadStream(_pa_stream, buffer, frames) == paInputOverflowed) 
00327         throw input_overflow(THROW_SITE_INFO("input overflow in Pa_ReadStream"));
00328     }
00329     virtual void write_data(const void* buffer, unsigned long frames) {
00330       ASSERT_THROW_PA(Pa_WriteStream(_pa_stream, buffer, frames));
00331     }
00332 
00333   private:
00334     PaStream*     _pa_stream;
00335     session::sptr _session;
00336   } ;
